game.name: Masha And The Bear Surgery
game.description:
Oh, it seems that today is a bad for the bear of Masha! He got injured while playing with Masha in the park. Masha loves her bear a lot, so she has decided to give him a needful treatment. But, she is new to this world, so she needs help to get him treated timely. Will you be able to take on this challenge and help Masha give her cute bear a timely treatment? Join Masha and The Bear Surgery game and show off the world that you also have a kind heart to the animal!

This is a big accident and the injury of Masha is very serious. She is worried about him and ready to do anything that could lessen his pain. It will be your responsibility now to take care of friend bear in this brand new doctor game for girls. Use the tools that you see on the left side of the screen to give him an urgent surgery! Make sure that you follow all the medical instructions to get the bear treated and help him relieve from the intense pain. 

Try to be fast to heal all his wounds and bring his smile back on his face in this one of the best surgery games for kids! Your every step will matter a lot to him and he soon feeling relaxed. Try out more surgical games for children on atmegame.com where the number of fun possibilities is very huge! We maintain a wide array of mobile doctor games that are available to play for free, without download. Grab your game and start having fun to the fullest!
